billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

title: Relates to application of the state uniform fire prevention and building code to certain premises owned or leased by the state or public authorities
summary: Relates to application of the state uniform fire prevention and building code; directs OGS to implement a phase-in of compliance for existing premises owned or leased by the state or certain public authorities.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to application of the state uniform fire prevention and building code to certain premises
